text.tspan: - Auto repayment instructions can be given for AA Financing.
- Auto repayment mechanism takes care of the new arrangement
fees and other scheduled fees The following details are given
- Pay in account There are three types of auto repayment
- Partial repayment (finance to be settled to extent of the funds
- None (If the balance is fully sufficient the finance would be fully
settled from the account, else no auto repayment would take
